channel.title: Portfolios on Harry's Creative Space
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on Harry's Creative Space

item.title: Horror Game : Deadly Game
item.description: Introduction: PC, First person single player horror game, playing as a white-collar worker who was caught by killer at 6:06 am one day. Without any special skills and strength, player need depend on himself to solve puzzles in each level of the house and escape from killer.

item.title: 2D platformer : Magic Thief
item.description: Introduction: Once upon a time, there is a kingdom called Zauberlehr. It has a great knowledge of magic and Spells, but it has a strict hierarchy. Only nobles can have the access to magic, common people are forbidden to use or even learn magic. However, there is a good thief called Roger, who is smart and full of a sense of justice…
